name: Four
description: Launched in 2025, FOUR ($FOUR) is a community-driven meme token built around four core principles that define its ecosystem: Trade, Build, Burn, and Commit. These pillars work together to create a balanced and sustainable community framework. Trade fuels liquidity and market activity. Build supports innovation and project growth. Burn introduces a deflationary element to preserve long-term value. Commit represents the collective trust and participation of the community. FOUR operates on the BNB Smart Chain with a total tax of 4% on buys and sells, allocated to buyback, marketing, and development. Although created for entertainment purposes, FOUR emphasizes transparency, fair tokenomics, and continuous engagement to maintain an active and supportive ecosystem.
